content.rendered:
Indulge in the ultimate winter treat with our hot chocolate gift set. Designed for those who appreciate the cozy comforts of a warm mug on a chilly day, this set includes everything you need for a luxurious hot chocolate experience. Whether you’re treating yourself or surprising a loved one, our hot chocolate gift set promises to deliver warmth and delight with every sip.

Range of treats include;
• Grounded Pleasure Drinking Chocolate (200g)
• A Fluted Hot Chocolate Mug
• Loco Love Chocolate ‘Butter Caramel Pecan’ Twin Pack

Presented in our signature gift bag and trailing ribbon.

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
